name: Magverse: The Riddle House Christmas Edition Demo
name_original: Magverse: The Riddle House Christmas Edition Demo
description:
This is a Christmas Demo of our upcoming magic puzzle escape game 'Magverse: The Riddle House'.

Summary: You are a wizard trapped in a magic world. In order to escape you need to enter the house-prison of four powerful wizards and witches to solve their riddles. You need to use your magic powers to solve the puzzles of each room. Once you solve the puzzles, a witch or wizard will appear to give you their riddle. Solve the riddle to leave the room. 

This is the our game's demo Christmas edition. If you want to check out the old demo for this game visit our itch.io site: https://lilithschild.itch.io/magverse-the-riddle-house-demo
